Text:
He's so close, he could reach out and touch her. For
a short while, the beautiful Blood Queen and the
jet-black Shadow stare at each other.

Everything is still, almost as if all the tempestuous
violence had never happened.
//ムービー
That should be fine for now.
...Although I'm far from fine.
Beta focuses intently on her own blood.
Eta's going to have a field day over this.
The Haven...
A place you enter with someone important to you...
Let's go, No. 666.

...That bastard's organization...Shadow Garden,
was it?
Pickin' a fight with them might be fun.
My step towards adulthood...
You're lucky just being alive.
My sword and armor—what a loss...
You're lucky just being alive.
*sigh*
(On a crisp autumn morning,)

(I wait for my sister as she goes to say her goodbyes
to her friend.)

(They've been talking for a while, so they probably
get along really well.)

(All sorts of stuff went down, but the Vampire
Progenitor event has come to an end.)

(Ghouls, vampires, and the possessed are all just
forms of magical overloads, only with different
names.)
(Curing them is easy enough.)
(But some afflictions are beyond any cure.)
(It happened last night, where we were staying.)

(I did kinda wander off on my own back in the Lawless
City, so I stopped by my sister's room to make a cursory
apology.)

(When I opened her door, I saw something. There was
some sorta badass magic circle on her hand, and she
was wrapping it up in a bandage to hide it.)

My left hand is trembling... A special power awakens
in me...
Where is my blood destiny leading me?
(I chose to say nothing and quietly closed the door.)

(A magic circle, a bandage cover, and a special
power... Yup, my sister's become afflicted.)

(But it wouldn't do for me to refute her here. This
is a path I—no, every child has once walked.)

(If you carelessly shut children down, they're liable
to get rebellious on you...)
Cid.
See...the truth is, I...

I have a special power...sleeping within my left
hand...
I need to unravel the mystery of this power...
Don't worry, I'm sure you'll manage.

I'll support you no matter what path you take,
Claire.
Thank you, Cid.
Cid...do you know about him...
...about Shadow?

Wasn't that the guy who burned down the Academy?
What about him?
No.
It's nothing.

(There are probably no shortage of hardships waiting
for my sister after this.)

(She'll struggle, she'll suffer, and she'll have to
confront some cold, hard truths. But if her left
hand is "throbbing," there's no getting around it.)
(It's all part of growing up, after all...)

(A lot of stuff happened, but that concludes this
event. Things got a little rocky when I ran into
some unforeseen problems in the middle there.)
(But hey, all's well that ends well, right?)

(The one thing I didn't manage to rescue, though,
was all the gold coins.)

(Of the 3,000 coins I had, I ended up with a scant
500. That comes out to 500 million Zeni. That's
nowhere near enough for me to retire on.)

(But after some thought, I've come to the conclusion
that maybe this is fine.)
(After all, the Lawless City is still standing,)

(and it's still got two towers left. If I ever run
low on funds, I can just stop by again.)
(In a way, the Lawless City is basically)
(my own personal piggy bank.)
Now then.
How about you state your business?
...Heheh.
